mapper.insert: insert into comments(commentNo, fbNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, recordDate, replyDepth, modification) values(#{commentNo}, #{fbNo}, #{commentWriter}, #{comments}, #{secret}, 0, now(), 0, false);
mapper.select: select commentNo, fbNo, commentWriter, comments, secret, replyCount, DATE_FORMAT(recordDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') recordDate, replyDepth, modification from comments where fbNo=#{fbNo }
select fbNo, fbWriter, title, contents, secret, DATE_FORMAT(recordDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') recordDate , views from freeboard order by recordDate desc limit #{startrow}, 9
select fbNo, fbWriter, title, contents, secret, DATE_FORMAT(recordDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') recordDate , views from freeboard where fbNo=#{fbNo}
mapper.update: update freeboard set views=views+1 where fbNo=#{fbNo}
mapper.select: update freeboard set fbWriter=#{fbWriter}, title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, secret=#{secret}, recordDate=now() where fbNo=#{fbNo}
